definition: to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: The bookrunner is listed first among all underwriters participating in the issuance.
sentences.chinese: 列出所有參與股票發行的承銷商。

sentences.english: The name of the underwriting organization as well as the relevant agreements.
sentences.chinese: 承銷機構名稱及有關的協議。

sentences.english: However, some sureties have more liberal underwriting guidelines for low risk classes of business.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一些有較多自由承銷擔保風險低的業務指導。

sentences.english: A group of underwriters that agrees to purchase a new issue of stock from the issuer for sale to the public.
sentences.chinese: 同意向發行人購買新股並向公衆出售的承銷商。

sentences.english: Securities companies shall not procure the underwriting business with improper means of competition.
sentences.chinese: 證券公司不得以不正當競爭手段招攬證券承銷業務。

sentences.english: Investment banking means the underwriting of securities.
sentences.chinese: 銀行投資業務意味着證券承銷。

sentences.english: But AIA and its bankers will go only so low.
sentences.chinese: 但友邦保險及其承銷投行不會繼續打折了。

sentences.english: That kind of optimism is hard for underwriters to price ahead of time. So is scarcity value.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這種樂觀主義而讓承銷商來提前標價是困難的。

sentences.english: investment banking does underwriting of securities.
the name of the underwriter and related agreements.
sentences.chinese: 承銷機構名稱及有關的協議。

sentences.english: The name of the underwriting institution as well as the relevant agreements.
sentences.chinese: 承銷機構名稱及有關的協議。

sentences.english: Activities by an underwriter to support the offering price of a new issue stock in the aftermarket.
sentences.chinese: 承銷商在後市市場支持新股招股價的行動。

sentences.english: An underwriting group is made of at least two underwriting organizations.
sentences.chinese: 承銷團由二個以上承銷機構組成。

sentences.english: An underwriting group is made of at least two underwriting organizations.
sentences.chinese: 承銷團由二個以上承銷機構組成。

pinyin: shou3 ci4 gong1 kai1 zhao1 gu3

definition: to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
